title: The Equifax Data Breach Pt. I: A Big Data Bubble
description: In their 120 year history, Equifax never sold anything, or provided any service to ordinary folks - except collect DATA. In 2017, that huge data repository, a 1000 times larger then the Library of Congress, got hacked.
content:encoded: In their 120 year history, Equifax never sold anything, or provided any service to ordinary folks – except collect DATA. In 2017, that huge data repository, a 1000 times larger then the Library of Congress, got hacked.
